control

Class OverlayInit

  • java.lang.Object
    • control.OverlayInit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    peersim.core.Control

    public class OverlayInit
extends java.lang.Object
implements peersim.core.Control
    Class that implements the initializer that parses the given Data Set and sets up the overlay network from it.
    Since:
    February 9, 2015
    Author:
    Giuseppe Miraglia

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String datasetPath 
      private java.lang.String FPeer_prefix 
      private int linkablePID 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OverlayInit(java.lang.String prefix)
      Constructor method.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private FPeer createAndAddFPeer(java.lang.String ID)
      Adds a new FPeer into the overlay network, generating an unique, pseudo-random, double-precision location key for it.
      boolean execute()
      The method performs the following operations:
      1) Parses the given data set (from a path, specified in the configuration file) using the values in it as FPeer identifiers;
      2) Creates the correspondent overlay network, allocating FPeers and filling their neighborhoods;
      3) Assigns an unique location key to each allocated FPeer, pseudo-random and evenly generated.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • OverlayInit

        public OverlayInit(java.lang.String prefix)
        Constructor method.
        Parameters:
        prefix - the prefix, in the PeerSim configuration file, of the initializer.

    • Method Detail

      • createAndAddFPeer

        private FPeer createAndAddFPeer(java.lang.String ID)
        Adds a new FPeer into the overlay network, generating an unique, pseudo-random, double-precision location key for it.
        Parameters:
        ID - the Data Set's identifier for the FPeer to add
        Returns:
        the created FPeer.

      • execute

        public boolean execute()
        The method performs the following operations:
        1) Parses the given data set (from a path, specified in the configuration file) using the values in it as FPeer identifiers;
        2) Creates the correspondent overlay network, allocating FPeers and filling their neighborhoods;
        3) Assigns an unique location key to each allocated FPeer, pseudo-random and evenly generated.
        Specified by:
        execute in interface peersim.core.Control
        Returns:
        true, if a problem occurs and the execution must be stopped; false otherwise.
